item.title: Player Save {pi}
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

if (token.equals("character-height")) { p.heightLevel = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-posx")) { p.teleportToX = (Integer.parseInt(token2) <= 0 ? 3210 : Integer.parseInt(token2)); } else if (token.equals("character-posy")) { p.teleportToY = (Integer.parseInt(token2) <= 0 ? 3424 : Integer.parseInt(token2)); } else if (token.equals("character-rights")) { p.playerRights = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("player-Xp")) { p.player-Xp = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("player-Title")) { p.playerTitle = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("mute-end")) { p.muteEnd = Long.parseLong(token2); } else if (token.equals("play-time")) { p.pTime = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("Used-Puremaster")) { p.pure = Integer.parseInt(token2);

I changed it to player-Xp.
And i need to see the other block…

item.title: Player Save {pi}
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

This is the block of code before and after it

if (token.equals("character-height")) { p.heightLevel = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-posx")) { p.teleportToX = (Integer.parseInt(token2) <= 0 ? 3210 : Integer.parseInt(token2)); } else if (token.equals("character-posy")) { p.teleportToY = (Integer.parseInt(token2) <= 0 ? 3424 : Integer.parseInt(token2)); } else if (token.equals("character-rights")) { p.playerRights = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("xp")) { p.xp = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("player-Title")) { p.playerTitle = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("mute-end")) { p.muteEnd = Long.parseLong(token2); } else if (token.equals("play-time")) { p.pTime = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("Used-Puremaster")) { p.pure = Integer.parseInt(token2);

And ye its ment to be p. everything els is and then i put c. it gives me errors

Read full topic

item.title: Player Save {pi}
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Did you add the closing bracket to this?:

 } else if (token.equals("xp")) {
                                                p.xp = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and is it supposed to be p.xp and not c.xp?

You should look at some of the other stuff added to player save to see how they are added.
